description:
A Kamaitachi demon instructed to watch and teach Rikuo. He fights using two or three sickles and his best skill is "Youkai Ninpou: Rera Makiri", a sickle wind blade. He, like most others dislike Kyoto demons. He turns into a Weasel in the day time and his true form is that of a weasel faced demon.
Source: wiki
name: Itaku
